About Newsme

Newsme is a small application making calls to NewsAPI. It allows you to see the top news related to the current day (tends to track in the news for the last few days), filter any news via a category button, or search via a topic term. You can also save an article to localstorage for future reading. It's built using ES6's Fetch API, SCSS, CSS Grid, and a multitude of things via Gulp's pipeline.

Link to Github
